titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to transfer 40 acres of land on the Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation, Montana, to Lame Deer High School District No. 6, Rosebud County, Montana, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8398)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/1/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to transfer certain lands on the Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation, Montana, to the Lame Deer High School District No. 6, Rosebud County, Montana, for construction of a high school and related facilities. Stipulates that such lands shall revert to the Secretary (to held in trust for the Northern Cheyenne Tribe) if the high school is not operating within a specified time or ceases operations.
